name: The Smurfs
summary: The Smurfs is a platform game based on the popular eponymous series.  Released by Infogrames in 1994 for home consoles and in 1997 for Windows, it was one of the few games available in more than one language, selectable by the player. A Game Boy Advance version was released in 2002, under the title "Revenge of The Smurfs"The PAL version specifically could be played in either English, French, Spanish, German and Italian.
